venue.address_1: Boston Common (next to Park St. MBTA)
venue.name: Freedom Trail

item.description:
We've got thousands (there were actually 5,000 printed) of Boston Tea Party Freedom Rally flyers, and we need to pass them out! The Park Street T-stop (Green/Red Line) is a very central location. Bring any signs and literature you have. While the focus is handing out the Tea Party Rally invites, having some lit with information about Ron Paul as well for those who are curious would be wonderful.

If you have any questions or can't find the group, call Michael Casey at 1-617-510-2487.

Also, if you come to the event empty handed, ask Michael to give you some leftover flyers to post on community bulliten boards, at colleges, etc. Spread the word!
item.name: Tea Party Rally invite handouts / sign wave
